name: RDP access is restricted from the internet
query: { securityGroups(where: {rules_SOME: {direction: "Inbound", action: "Allow", AND: [{OR: [{sources_INCLUDES: "cidr:0.0.0.0/0"}, {sources_INCLUDES: "cidr:::/0"}, {sources_INCLUDES: "tag:Internet"}, {sources: []}]}, {OR: [{sourceFromPort_LTE: 3389, sourceToPort_GTE: 3389}]}]}}) { identifier accountID cloudAccountID cloudAccountName cloudProvider idFromProvider internalAssetType internalName internalRegion assetCategory contentHash }}
